name: Brew Crew! - Bonfire Jam
description:
A fun puzzle & cooking game...with cute animals!
  • What is it about? - Meet the Crew - Features & Guide - Credits

* Using a new micro-brewing cauldron she invented, Maple the Squirrel can brew up bubbles of coffee, tea, matcha, and hot chocolate, all together! But without her friends helping, her dreams of opening up a little cafe might be impossible. Can Maple and her friends convince a bullheaded investor to take on risk on this new tech, or will they just end up blowing bubbles?

This game was made in 48 hours for the Bonfire Game Jam~

*

Excitable and optimistic, this squirrel has big dreams of opening up a new kind of coffee delivery service with her friends! Wren is the fastest delivery flier in the whole forest! He'll make sure that your hot beverage gets to you fast! A master of the backroom deal, Ash can always find a bargain on prime ingredients. He'll keep the cafe stocked up while Maple handles all the sciency-stuff. A wall street bull who's good with the numbers. He's interested in taking up new investments, and this novel micro-brewer seems like a capital idea! Can Maple convince him to invest in her latest dream? * Benefits of micro-brewing:
  • When you get a recipe, all of your ingredients are already in the pot! Just pop the bubbles requested for their drink order, and a steaming cup is ready in an instant.
  • If you really want to spoil your customers, you can pop multiple bubbles of the same type, to make a stunning brew. Just make sure that you pop similar things together, or you might make a mess.
  • Followers love to watch the combos. Build your online empire while you brew!
